net.i2p.servlet

Class I2PDefaultServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • org.eclipse.jetty.servlet.DefaultServlet
          • net.i2p.servlet.I2PDefaultServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Servlet, ServletConfig, ResourceFactory

    public class I2PDefaultServlet
extends DefaultServlet
    Extends DefaultServlet to set locale for the displayed time of directory listings, to prevent leaking of the locale.
    Since:
    0.9.31
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
